channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- iTunes U
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- iTunes U

item.title: CVE-2021-30862|2024-08-03T22:48:13.320Z -- apple -- itunes%20u
item.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization. This issue is fixed in iTunes U 3.8.3. Processing a maliciously crafted URL may lead to arbitrary javascript code execution.
